item.title: Golden Joystick Awards 2024 – All Award Winners
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/golden-joystick-awards-2024-all-award-winners/

Fortnite’s Next Concert Will Feature Snoop Dogg, Eminem, Juice WRLD and Ice Spice

Fortnite’s Remix: The Finale concert will be held on November 30 and feature performances from Snoop Dogg, Eminem, Juice WRLD, and Ice Spice.

Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 List of Known Issues (UPDATED)

Developers Treyarch and Raven Software have released a list of the known issues in Call of Duty: Black Ops 6.

Hyper Light Breaker Developer Heart Machine Suffers Layoffs

Heart Machine, the developers behind Hyper Light Drifter and Hyper Light Breaker, is the next games studio suffering layoffs in 2024.

Fortnite is Gearing up for a Cyberpunk 2077 Collab, It’s Claimed

According to the latest leaks, Fortnite could soon collaborate with Cyberpunk 2077. Here are more details.

item.title: STALKER 2: Where To Find Pre-Order Items (Guide)
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/where-to-find-pre-order-items-stalker-2/

If you’ve pre-ordered STALKER 2 or bought a higher edition, you’ll have learned that you’re able to unlock a series of unique weapons and outfits as you explore the game. However, it’s not immediately available where to find pre-order items in STALKER 2, which can leave you feeling confused.

In this guide, I’ll help you figure out where to get your pre-order bonus in STALKER 2.

Read on!

How To Get Pre-Order Items in STALKER 2

If you’re trying to figure out where to find your pre-order items in STALKER 2, you’ll need to follow a particular quest that’ll take you all over The Zone.

It’s called Seek, And You Shall Find, and it’s started after you complete ‘A Needle in a Haystack’ in Zalissya, the first major settlement you find in the Lesser Zone. The quest you need will be started once you’ve picked up a flash drive left in your stash by a mysterious individual.

Alternatively, you can track down the white, single-storey building and find the PDA jammed between two beds to kickstart the quest.

Once you’ve activated Seek, And You Shall Find, you’ll notice that a string of stash locations have been added to the map on your PDA. If you head to each location, you’ll be rewarded with an exclusive weapon or outfit – these are the pre-order items in STALKER 2.

They’re also what you’ll receive for buying the Ultimate or Deluxe editions of the game.

There’s at least one Journalist Stash in each area of the map, and almost all of them require a little snooping to find. Perhaps you’ll need to find your way around a locked door or up onto a building, but they’re all relatively accessible and with a little common sense, you’ll have them tracked down in no time.

It’s not immediately obvious, but that’s where to get your pre-order bonus in STALKER 2. It takes a little work and a lot of walking, but as you’ll naturally explore The Zone on your travels, you can work passively to tick them off as and when you get near them.

That’s where to find pre-order items in STALKER 2 – happy hunting! Stop by the Insider Gaming forum if you want to chat about the game.

For more STALKER 2 guides, check out how to defeat a Burer

item.title: All Black Ops 6 Ranked Play rewards
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/all-black-ops-6-ranked-play-rewards/

Black Ops 6 Ranked Play is the perfect place to put your skills to the test on a variety of maps and modes against similarly skilled players, and there are some great rewards up for grabs too.

Those wondering what kind of Operator skins and other cosmetics you can earn by sinking time into the competitive mode, here are all the rewards in Black Ops 6 Ranked Play.

Every Black Ops 6 Ranked Play reward

How do I earn Ranked Play rewards in BO6?

You can earn Ranked Play rewards in Black Ops 6 by getting wins and reaching higher ranks.

You’ll get the most out of Ranked Play and perform better with the best loadouts and also a solid squad, as communication is everything. If you don’t have a squad, make sure you have a mic and communicate with your teammates for the best results.

Have you started your BO6 Ranked Play journey yet? If so, let us know how it’s going by dropping a comment in the Insider Gaming forum.

For more CoD guides, check out how the Ranksack game mode works and how to unlock the new Krig C AR for BO6 and Warzone.
